p: Whole brain, spinal cord, spleen, heart and blood were collected from rOC43-ns2DelRluc-infected mice, homogenized in phosphate-buffered saline (PBS) using a FastPrep instrument (MP Biomedical, Strasbourg, France) and centrifuged at 14,000 rpm for 10 min at 4 °C to remove tissue debris. The supernatant was collected and aliquoted for further study.
